problem.markdown: >>Where does there tend to be greater species diversity?<< Choose the THREE that apply. [x] in wetter climates [ ] at higher latitudes [ ] in smaller geographic areas, such as islands [x] at lower elevation [x] closer to the equator [explanation] There tends to be a greater number of species (increased diversity) at lower elevations and in wetter climates, as well in ecosystems closer to the equator. There tends to be fewer species in small geographic areas and at higher latitudes. [explanation]
problem.p: Where does there tend to be greater species diversity? Choose the THREE that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: Where does there tend to be greater species diversity?
checkboxgroup.choice: in smaller geographic areas, such as islands

div.p: There tends to be a greater number of species (increased diversity) at lower elevations and in wetter climates, as well in ecosystems closer to the equator. There tends to be fewer species in small geographic areas and at higher latitudes.
